sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含"监禁"之意。
means: confine ： 指监禁或幽禁；也指任何使行动受到限制的行为。
imprison ： 较正式用词，多指较长时间的监禁。
jail ： (英国用gaol)多指审判之间的拘禁或对罪行较轻的罪犯的监禁。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"限制，限定"之意。
means: limit ： 一般指事先确定空间、时间或数量的极限，一旦超越限度，就会造成不良结果。当然也可指不事先规定，而且自然的或固有的界限。
confine ： 侧重施加不可逾越的限制，有时暗示束缚、囚禁。
restrict ： 指把某人或物限制在一定范围之内。

sentence.Network_en: Doctors confine themselves to prescribing rather than dispensing.
sentence.Network_cn: 医生仅仅是开药而不配药。

sentence.Network_en: Doctors are trying to confine the disease within the city.
sentence.Network_cn: 医生正试图将此病控制在城内.

sentence.Network_en: He thinks it cruel to confine a lark in a cage.
sentence.Network_cn: 他认为把云雀关在笼子里太残忍了.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (as a noun): from French confins (plural noun), from Latin confinia, from confinis 'bordering', from con- 'together' + finis 'end, limit' (plural fines 'territory'). The verb senses are from French confiner, based on Latin confinis

entry.tran: 限制，限定（防止扩散蔓延）
entry.def: To confine something to a particular place or group means to prevent it from spreading beyond that place or group.

example.ex: Health officials have successfully confined the epidemic to the Tabatinga area...
example.tran: 卫生官员成功地将疫情控制在塔巴廷加地区。

example.ex: The US will soon be taking steps to confine the conflict.
example.tran: 美国很快就会采取措施限制冲突。

entry.tran: 限制(自己或自己的活动);使受局限
entry.def: If you confine yourself or your activities to something, you do only that thing and are involved with nothing else.

example.ex: He did not confine himself to the one language...
example.tran: 他没把自己局限于这一门语言。

example.ex: Yoko had largely confined her activities to the world of big business...

entry.def: If someone is confined to a mental institution, prison, or other place, they are sent there and are not allowed to leave for a period of time.

example.ex: The woman will be confined to a mental institution...
example.tran: 这个女人将被关进精神病院。

example.ex: He announced that the army and police had been confined to barracks.
example.tran: 他通告说军队和警察已经被禁闭在营房中不得外出。

entry.def: Something that is within the confines of an area or place is within the boundaries enclosing it.

example.ex: The movie is set entirely within the confines of the abandoned factory.
example.tran: 电影的拍摄完全是在这个废弃的工厂厂区内进行。

example.ex: ...the wild grass and weeds that grew in the confines of the grandstand.

entry.def: The confines of a situation, system, or activity are the limits or restrictions it involves.

example.ex: ...away from the confines of the British class system...
example.tran: 超越英国社会等级制度的限制

example.ex: I can't stand the confines of this marriage.
example.tran: 我受不了这段婚姻的限制。

means.word_mean: 1. restrict or confine, "I limit you to two visits to the pub a day"

sentences.sentence: "restrict the use of this parking lot"
"limit the time you can spend with your friends"

means.word_mean: 3. prevent from leaving or from being removed
5. deprive of freedom; take into confinement
6. to close within bounds, limit or hold back from movement;

sentences.sentence: "This holds the local until the express passengers change trains"
"About a dozen animals were held inside the stockade"
"The illegal immigrants were held at a detention center"
"The terrorists held the journalists for ransom"

stems_affixes.type_exp: =limit,boundary,end 表示"结束,范围,界限,限制"

stems_affixes.value_cn: 被限制的, 狭窄的, 分娩的
stems_affixes.word_buile: confine[v.限制;使不外出,禁闭n.[n.]界限,范围]+ed……的→adj.被限制的, 狭窄的, 分娩的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 确切的,权威性的;最后的,决定性的
stems_affixes.word_buile: define[v.给……下定义;阐述;阐释;限定,规定]+itive……的→规定了的,决定了的
fine范围,限制→[罚款]以约束,限制

stems_affixes.value_cn: 给……下定义;阐述;阐释;限定,规定

stems_affixes.word_buile: fine范围,限制→[罚款]以约束,限制

Sentence.sentence: It is mainly confined to youngsters
The injury will confine Anna to bed for quite a while.

sentences.en: She confined her activities in educational circles.
sentences.cn: 她把她的各项活动都限制在教育圈内。

means.word_mean: 禁闭; 管制; 关起来

sentences.en: They confined the prisoner in a cell.
sentences.cn: 他们把犯人监禁在监狱里。

jushi.english: She confined her activities in educational circles.
jushi.chinese: 她把她的各项活动都限制在教育圈内。

jushi.english: The thief is confined in prison.
